name: PDFOutput | Automate Documents in Notion
description: Document Automation Platform for NotionPDFOutput is a powerful PDF generator platform that automates the creation of repetitive documents such as invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters, and more.What is PDFOutput?PDFOutput is a powerful PDF generator platform that automates the creation of repetitive documents such as invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters, and more.It requires two components: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholder
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Add Google Doc Template: Upload a Google Doc with placeholders like{{ClientName}}or{{InvoiceDate}}.; Connect Notion Database: Link your Notion database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Generate PDFs: Instantly create customized PDFs for each database row, ready to download or share.; Effortless Automation: Generate hundreds of customized documents in minutes using Notion data.; Seamless Notion Integration: Securely connect to your Notion database with a single click.; Placeholder Mapping: Easily map template placeholders to Notion database properties for precise document generation.; Versatile Document Types: Create contracts, invoices, proposals, letters, and more with one tool.; Time-Saving Scalability: Eliminate manual data entry and produce professional documents at scale.
